## Problem Set Overview

This problem set introduces you to spatial data in R.

## Spatial data in R

1. Use one of your project datasets that contains spatial information (or find a new one). Convert it to a spatially aware `sf` object.

2. Perform a spatial intersection associating data from another source with your data.



## How to Submit

You should create a new webpage on your google site titled `Project 2 Problem Set 3`. Submit the link to your google site webpage in Canvas.
